Battle Effects.name: Battle Effects
Battle Effects.description: See @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Mass Battles]{Mass Battles} for when to use this table.

Creative Combat.name: Creative Combat
Creative Combat.description: Creative Combat enhances a pulp-style game with additional benefits for those who Test with a raise. See @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Creative Combat]{Creative Combat} on when to use these rules.

Dynamic Backlash.name: Dynamic Backlash
Dynamic Backlash.description: Normally, a Critical Failure on an arcane skill results in Fatigue. If the GM feels it should have a higher price, use this table instead. See @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Dynamic Backlash]{Dynamic Backlash}

Fear Table.name: Fear Table
Fear Table.description:
<article class="swade-core">
Change the Roll Table Formula to include the modifier, like "d20+2". Or for easier rolls, click @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-macros.Fear Table]{Fear Table Macro} to be prompted for a modifier. If you did use the Macro to get this result, please disregard this message. You can read more about the Fear table by clicking @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Fear]{here}</article>

Injury Table.name: Injury Table
Injury Table.description: If @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Damage Effects]{Incapacitated} and failed Vigor roll, roll on this table.

Out of Control.name: Out of Control
Out of Control.description: <article class="swade-core">Damage caused by an Out of Control roll doesnâ€™t trigger another Out of Control roll, but a Wound triggers a Critical Hit as usual. See @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Chases and Vehicles]{Maneuvering Skills} to learn more</article>

Reaction Table.name: Reaction Table
Reaction Table.description: <article class="swade-core">The GM can use the table below to roll or choose a character or group's initial attitude. See @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.Persuasion]{Persuasion} on how to use this table. </article>
